keyblock_interval.help: Interval, in seconds, between keyblocks. If 0, keyblocks are only produced on-demand

microblock_interval.help: Interval, in seconds, between microblocks. If 0, microblocks are only produced on-demand

auto_emit_microblocks.help: Emit microblocks as soon as transactions have been pushed to the mempool

prefunded_accounts.description: When not using a synced Chain Database, devmode gives you a set of prefunded accounts
